title: RBI deputy governor calls for strengthening governance at small finance banks
description: A deputy governor of India's central bank has advised small finance banks to stay alert for potential risks that could impact their long-term stability. In a speech released on Monday, J. Swaminathan emphasized the need for these banks to carefully evaluate their reliance on specific types of deposits.
